/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. Vehicles, including cars and trucks, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the entire scene. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
